name: content-marketing-pack
description: Skills for content creation, SEO optimization, campaign planning, and social media strategy
author: CoWork-OSS

skills.name: Blog Post Draft
skills.description: Draft a blog post with SEO optimization, structure, and engaging content
skills.prompt:
Write a blog post on the following topic.

Topic: {{topic}}
Target audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}

Please include:
1. SEO-optimized title (under 60 characters)
2. Meta description (under 160 characters)
3. Introduction with a hook
4. 3-5 main sections with headers (H2/H3)
5. Key takeaways or bullet points
6. Call-to-action
7. Suggested internal/external link opportunities
8. 5-10 target keywords

skills.name: Social Media Posts
skills.description: Generate social media posts for multiple platforms from a single topic or announcement
skills.prompt:
Create social media posts for the following content.

Content/Announcement: {{content}}
Platforms: {{platforms}}

For each platform, provide:
- Post text (optimized for character limits)
- Suggested hashtags
- Best posting time
- Image/visual suggestions
- Engagement hook

skills.name: Campaign Plan
skills.description: Create a marketing campaign plan with timeline, channels, and budget allocation
skills.prompt:
Create a marketing campaign plan.

Campaign goal: {{goal}}
Budget: {{budget}}
Timeline: {{timeline}}

Please include:
1. Campaign overview and objectives
2. Target audience personas
3. Channel strategy (paid, organic, email, social)
4. Content calendar outline
5. Budget allocation by channel
6. KPIs and success metrics
7. A/B testing opportunities
8. Risk mitigation

agentRoles.name: marketing-specialist
agentRoles.description: Specializes in content creation, SEO, social media strategy, and campaign planning
agentRoles.systemPrompt: You are a Marketing Specialist agent. You excel at creating compelling content, optimizing for SEO, planning multi-channel campaigns, and analyzing marketing performance. You write in an engaging, audience-appropriate style and make data-driven recommendations.
